title: Outbreaks at seniors' homes linked to almost half of COVID-19 deaths in Canada, Theresa Tam says - The Globe and Mail

content:
Funeral home workers remove a body from the Centre d'hébergement Sainte-Dorothée, on April 13, 2020, in Laval, Que. There have been 26 deaths related to the novel coronavirus at the Sainte-Dorothée centre.
Ryan Remiorz/The Canadian Press
